name: SimpleSave
tagline: SimpleSave is a super simple web server that allows for easy storage and retrieval of key-value pairs of strings.
body:
### Welcome to Simplicity.
SimpleSave is a super simple web server written in python.  
It is used for storing key-value pairs on strings.
Storing a key-value pair:

       wget http://localhost/?k=key&v=value

Retrieving a previously stored value:

       wget http://localhost/?k=key

### Author
John (Jack) Mckeown (@jackeown)
